item.title: Keri Russell, Noah Wyle, Sterling K. Brown and More Variety’s Actors on Actors, Cover Stars Score 2025 Emmy Nominations
item.description: Variety is celebrating the 2025 Emmy nominees who have graced the magazine’s covers and participated in Actors on Actors. The nominations for the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards were announced Tuesday morn
